Performer:
Takemoto Aioidayū IV (see also Takemoto Aikodayū I) (竹本相生大夫 (四))

Alternate Name: Takemoto Aikodayū I (竹本相子大夫 (一))

Dates: '1971/10-'

Specialty: Tayu

Notes: Bunraku meikan (1980, 1985, 1988, 1990, 1994)


– Click image to view.
